text: Uye pose paunobuda (pakunamata), tendeudza huso hwako kudivi re Al-Masjid Al-Haraam (iri kuMakkah), uyezve kwese kwamunenge muri (pakunamata), tendeudzai zviso zvenyu kudivi rayo kuitira kuti vanhu vasave nokupikisana pamusoro penyu kunze kweavo vaiti vezvakaipa pakati pavo, nokudaro musavatye asi ityai inini! Uyezve kuti ndive ndinozadzikisa makomborero angu kwamuri uyezve kuti muve vanhu vari pagwara
